nodes.text: The Endless Hour was the Ussan term used on Bellassa to describe the long afternoon light that accompanied the twilight in the city of Ussa. Beginning their workday in the early morning allowed them to return home to spend the endless hour with their families. The many parks and restaurants of Ussa were popular gathering places during the endless hour. When the Galactic Empire came to power, many Ussans stayed within their homes to avoid giving the Imperial agents a reason to persecute them.
